title: Intesa Sanpaolo
description: Intesa Sanpaolo, a leading financial services group in Italy, expresses its identity through a vibrant brand palette. The primary colors include a deep green (#008652) symbolizing stability, an energetic orange (#E98A42) reflecting innovation, and a rich gold (#DEB630) illustrating prosperity. Complementing these hues is a solid blue (#01669B), embodying trust and reliability. These colors are widely recognized across their corporate presentations and marketing materials.
